quote: The embryological record is almost always abbreviated in accordance with the tendency of nature (to be explained on the principle of survival of the fittest) to attain her needs by the easiest means.
quote_letters: THE EMBRYOLOGICAL RECORD IS ALMOST ALWAYS ABBREVIATED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TENDENCY OF NATURE TO BE EXPLAINED ON THE PRINCIPLE OF SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST TO ATTAIN HER NEEDS BY THE EASIEST MEANS
